about.headline: Welcome to FileBin mobile!
about.description:
This application is a mobile client for FileBin and it's open source. It helps you to manage your pastes.

In order to use the application, you need access to a FileBin instance.
about.faq:
- How do I login?
Insert your instance URL and valid credentials you also use in the web interface of FileBin.

- Why is storage permission required?
It's not required, but highly advised to grant it. Otherwise sharing files with the app won't work correctly and you might think that sharing has no effect.

- When I am logged out, sharing files via share with the app won't list all files I selected after I login.
Please login before you start using the app. Account information are persisted. You only need to do it once.

dialog.title: Link opening failed
dialog.description: Could not open '{link}'. Please ensure that you have an application installed which handles opening such link types.

dialog.title: Storage permission
dialog.description: Storage permission should be granted to the app so that it can work properly. Do you want to grant permission or ignore this message permanently in the future?
